title: A Silent Supporter
content: I’ve always admired how you handle pressure. It’s truly a superpower.

title: The Honest Truth
content: You deserve to take a break. Don't let the hustle burn you out completely.

title: Mystery Question
content: If you could change one thing about your past, what would it be?

title: Random Thought
content: The way you talk about your hobbies is infectious. Never stop being passionate.
